Title: Requires the state university of New York and the city university of New York to examine and conduct a study on the availability of campus services, programs and resources for veteran students
Summary: Requires the state university of New York and the city university of New York to examine and conduct a study on the availability of campus services, programs and resources for veteran students.
ActClause: AN ACT requiring the state university of New York and the city university of New York to examine and conduct a study on the availability of campus services, programs and resources for veterans
